title: SCC drives 65% profit rise for Rigby Group
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now SCC drives 65% profit rise for Rigby Group Rigby Group owns a number of airports including Exeter PA Photo/Exeter Airport Deirdre Hipwell Last updated at 12:20PM, August 7 2015 
Rigby Group, the family-owned company headed by one of Britain’s wealthiest men, has reported another strong year with pre-tax profits up more than 65 per cent. 
The £1.8 billion portfolio business, which which is headed by Sir Peter Rigby, has made pre-tax profits of £15.9 million in the year to March 21, up from £9.6 million last year. 
Much of the pick up in performance has come from SCC, or Specialist Computer Centres, its technology business which accounts for well over half of the group’s more than £2 billion of revenue, and its airport division.
